verbs.description: [V: rockies] gm does n't expect to trade arenado with free agency looming the colorado rockies plan to head into the 2019 season with nolan arenado even if it just for one more year the four - time all - star is arbitration eligible for a fourth and final time this winter before hitting the open market and rockies general manager jeff bridich acknowledged that he had honest conversations over the last several years about arenado long - term status with the team there not a perfect timeline or a specific mvp rockies colorado arenado mike hampton denver post jeff bridich general manager baseball kyle newman gm nolan arenado colorado rockies mlb agency wade davis ian desmond charlie blackmon
